p: Genetic differentiation among the BMSB populations was estimated by the fixation index (F ST), and the overall genetic variance was calculated by AMOVA (Analysis of molecular variance). Both calculations were fulfilled using Arlequin 3.5 [ 42]. To show the genetic relationships among the populations, a Principal Coordinates Analysis (PCoA) was conducted based on the F ST data (Additional file 3) using GenAlEx 6.5 [ 43]. The relationships among the COI and COII combined haplotypes were examined using a parsimony network by applying the method described by TCS analysis [ 44] based on the COI-COII combined haplotypes and visualized using PopART [ 45].
